name: Happy Yak Mandarin Beef and Rice
description: The bright sweetness of orange finishes every bite of this satisfying meal. Loaded with pieces of tender beef, vegetables and toasted, slivered almonds, one bite of Happy Yak’s Mandarin Beef and Rice and you will understand why this is one their signature dishes.Ingredients: rice, freeze-dried beef (beef, onion, spices), orange sauce [glucose solids, hydrolysed corn protein, potato starch, sugar, corn starch, tapioca starch, caramel (sulphites), yeast extract, brown sugar, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, tomato powder, spices, citric acid, dried orange zest, sodium citrate, artificial flavour, Arabic gum, colour], dried mandarin oranges, toasted slivered almonds, freeze-dried vegetables (green bean, corn, red bell pepper, pea, broccoli, carrot, water chestnut, mushroom), dried onion flakes.May contain: peanuts, sesame, egg, milk, fish, sea food, soy, wheat and mustard.
